snippet.title: Infinium Strike Story Trailer
snippet.description:
https://www.gog.com/game/infinium_strike

Non-stop galactic action awaits you in arcade-style Tower Defence. Manage the defences of the TSF Freedom Strike – humanity’s last hope against the hordes of invading aliens.

The year is 2170. One after another, the human colonies have fallen to the seemingly limitless invasion force of the enigmatic, bio-mechanical Wrog. Entire armadas of Earth’s starfighters have been decimated. Our last hope lies with the Freedom Strike, a massive super-tech Battlecarrier fitted with interchangeable turrets and a fleet of specialized drones, built with one purpose –annihilate the Wrog and save our species!

Infinium Strike is an original tactical TD game that sees you as the Weapons Officer aboard the TSF Freedom Strike. Scavenge Infinium – the living metal of the cosmos – from the wreckage of your enemies to create powerful turrets and deadly drones, and turn the tide of the Wrog war. Will the Battlecarrier Freedom Strike survive the relentless waves of Wrog fighters?
